titleStmt.title: Mercy to a beast A sermon preached at Saint Maries Spittle in London on Tuseday in Easter-weeke. 1612. By Iohn Rawlinson Doctor of Divinitie.
titleStmt.author: Rawlinson, John, 1576-1630.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
